title: Devotee's Mace
content:
Devotee's Mace Legendary 5~17 Damage 1d6+3Bludgeoning+1d8Radiant Weapon Enchantment +3 Main Hand OnlyHealing Incense Aura Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This weapon is favoured by celestial devas, the vanguards of the divine ranks of paradise. Mace 1.8 640
